name: jasmine-spec-reporter
description: Spec reporter for jasmine behavior-driven development framework

scripts.test:integration: npm run pretest && npm run update-examples && jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=spec/support/jasmine-integration.json
scripts.update-examples: (cd examples/node && rm -rf node_modules && npm install) && (cd examples/protractor && rm -rf node_modules && npm install)
scripts.coverage: npm run pretest && rm -rf coverage && istanbul cover jasmine && npm run remap-coverage
scripts.remap-coverage: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/lcov-ts.info -t lcovonly && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/html-report -t html
scripts.coveralls: npm run coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov-ts.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Bastien Caudan
